name: CutePets
description: Twitter bot that posts adoptable pets in your city.

api_key.description: Your Twitter consumer key goes here

api_secret.description: Your Twitter consumer secret key goes here

access_token.description: Your Twitter access token goes here

access_token_secret.description: Your Twitter access token secret goes here

petharbor_shelter_id.description: The id of the pet harbpr shelter

petharbor_pet_types.description: The types of pets to search for ('dog', 'cat', or 'others', separated by spaces)

pet_datasource.description: The pet data source (don't change this)
